snippet: President Mohamed Morsi has freed a group of Islamists jailed for militancy during Hosni Mubarak’s era, a step seen as a gesture to hard-liners who supported his presidential bid.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi frees a group of Islamists jailed for militancy during Hosni Mubarak’s era, a step seen as a gesture to hard-liners who supported his presidential bid.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Morsi has freed a group of Islamists jailed for militancy during Hosni Mubarak’s era, a step seen as a gesture to hard-liners who supported his presidential bid.
